Phantasmal Archers

spell id [id]: 30
effect number [effect_number]: 38
damage [damage]: 3233
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 20
Remote Summon (Temporary units):#3233 Phantasmal Archer x 20
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The mage projects an illusionary army at a province far away. The mage is able to guide the army into killing any enemies located there. The illusionary army will dissolve once the attack has been completed or if there are no enemies in the targeted province.
